DOC.brief_summary: Quality Life ( QoL ) Korean postmenopausal osteoporosis patient bisphosphonate treatment
DOC.brief_title: Quality Life ( QoL ) Korean Postmenopausal Osteoporosis Patients With Bisphosphonate Treatment
DOC.detailed_description: Cross-sectional quality life survey use self-administered OPSAT-QTM questionnaire Korean postmenopausal osteoporosis patient bisphosphonate treatment
DOC.criteria: Who diagnose postmenopausal osteoporosis physician Who receive oral bisphosphonates ( weekly monthly ) least 2 month provide answer OPSATQTM questionnaire Who provide inform consent study participation Do understand content questionnaire
